description:
The fearless Maid, morning star in hand, marches ever rightwards through the ancient castle!
Obliterating the weird and/or ghoulish foes blocking her path to the deepest chambers, what she finds waiting for her must be seen to be believed!

Originally released in 2004, Zangyuraâ€™s unique blend of puzzles and action has returned as a modernized remaster, Super Zangyura.
The music and visuals have been overhauled, but the simple yet satisfying old-school action has been kept intact!
name: SUPER ZANGYURA
intro: An incredible evil threatens the world once again!
